name: BALLAD OF THE ASURA - DEMO FILE
name_original: BALLAD OF THE ASURA - DEMO FILE
description:
The File you are downloading is a small demo for the Asura Boss Battle in BALLAD OF THE ASURA. Kindly note that the game is still in production and what you as a player are accessing is work-in-progress demo gameplay. Audio and Sound is not included in yet. And should you be able to defeat the Asura, the Death Animation are not activated in yet. We appreciate your patience as we continue to develop this game. We would love to have you participate in our Patreon Crowd Funding Campaign Soon.

Keys and Commands for Gameplay

Walk - wasd

Run - shift hold

Right click hold - shield

Right click perfect time  parry

Left click once standard attack

Left click hold power attack

Middle click target lock on

Space Bar Dodge roll
